mapper.select: SELECT privgroupid FROM hopeprivgroup WHERE #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR odeptid = #{odeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into hopeprivgroup (privgroupid, privtype, aamid, deptid, odeptid) values (#{privgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
